item.title: 法院否决 Signa 债务计划，称其 "显然不可行
item.description: 奥地利一家法院挫败了重组 Signa Prime Selection AG 的努力，称由债权人支持的出售 Rene Benko 旗舰部门所持财产的计划 "显然不可行"。【原文：An Austrian court has thrown a wrench in attempts to restructure Signa Prime Selection AG, saying a creditor-backed plan to sell property held by Rene Benko’s flagship unit was “obviously not feasible.”】

item.title: 加拿大限制矿业开采的举措损害了大型金属生产商的利益，斯科舍说
item.description: 加拿大丰业银行（Bank of Nova Scotia）的矿业分析师表示，加拿大限制外资收购矿业公司的新规定将使加拿大最大的金属生产商的估值低于全球同行。【原文：New Canadian rules limiting foreign takeovers of mining companies will leave the nation’s biggest metals producers with lower valuations than their global peers, according to Bank of Nova Scotia’s mining analysts.】

item.title: 米莱的 "休克疗法 "使阿根廷牛肉需求降至 110 年最低点
item.description: 阿根廷因牛肉消费量位居榜首而闻名于世，但随着家庭试图拉长日益减少的工资收入，它却出人意料地转向了价格更低廉的鸡肉。【原文：Argentina, famous for its chart-topping consumption of beef, has made a surprising pivot toward cheaper chicken as households try to stretch their dwindling paychecks.】

item.title: 受中西部降雨预测影响，玉米跌至 2020 年以来最低点
item.description: 玉米期货跌至疫情最严重以来的最低水平，因为预计中西部地区的丰沛降雨将提高产量。【原文：Corn futures slumped to the lowest level since the height of the pandemic as abundant rain forecast for the Midwest is expected to boost yields.】

item.title: 中国氧化铝生产商在价格飙升后增加产量
item.description: 中国氧化铝生产商正在提高产量，以利用两年多来最高的价格。【原文：Chinese alumina producers are boosting output to take advantage of the highest prices in more than two years.】

item.title: Broadcom 启动债券销售，为 VMware 交易贷款再融资
item.description: 博通公司（Broadcom Inc）周一将利用美国投资级债券市场，为其690亿美元收购VMware Inc.的部分贷款进行再融资。【原文：Broadcom Inc. is tapping the US investment-grade bond market on Monday, to refinance a portion of the loans it secured to pay for its $69 billion acquisition of VMware Inc.】

item.title: 市场权衡飓风贝里尔的影响，棉花出现波动
item.description: 由于交易商密切关注周一早在得克萨斯州登陆的飓风贝里尔的路径，棉花出现波动。【原文：Cotton fluctuated as traders monitored the path of Hurricane Beryl, which made landfall in Texas early Monday.】

item.title: 高盛的鲁布纳认为股市下跌是下一个痛苦交易
item.description: 高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.【原文：August is poised to kick off a painful two-week stretch for US stocks as money pours out of equities, according to Goldman Sachs Group Inc.’s Scott Rubner.】

item.title: 加州地震保险公司出售市政债务以避免支付更多保险费
item.description: 加利福尼亚州一家由州政府管理的房主地震保险公司选择从公共债务市场借款，而不是支付额外的保险费用来抵御风险。【原文：A state-managed earthquake insurer for homeowners in California is opting to borrow from the public debt market in lieu of paying for additional coverage that would shield it against risks.】

item.title: 摩根士丹利的威尔逊称股市 "极有可能 "回调 10
item.description: 摩根士丹利（Morgan Stanley）的迈克-威尔逊（Mike Wilson）认为，随着美国总统竞选、企业盈利和美联储政策等不确定因素的涌现，交易者应做好股市回调的准备。【原文：Traders should brace for a correction in the stock market as uncertainty swirls around the US presidential campaign, corporate earnings and Federal Reserve policy, according to Morgan Stanley’s Mike Wilson.】

item.title: 中国比亚迪签约 10 亿美元在土耳其建厂，并将目光投向欧洲
item.description: 全球最大的电动汽车制造商之一比亚迪股份有限公司与土耳其签署了一项建厂协议，此举可能会加强这家中国汽车制造商在欧洲的立足点。【原文：BYD Co., one of the world’s largest electric vehicle manufacturers, has signed a deal with Turkey to build a factory, a move that could bolster the Chinese automaker’s foothold in Europe.】

item.title: 不列颠哥伦比亚省省长在资源繁荣与绿色目标之间走钢丝
item.description: 不列颠哥伦比亚省省长戴维-艾比（David Eby）认为，该省可以利用其丰富的资源和毗邻亚洲的地理位置，同时又不牺牲其政治纲领的核心环境承诺。【原文：British Columbia Premier David Eby sees a way for his province to exploit its abundant resources and proximity to Asia — without sacrificing environmental pledges core to his political platform.】

item.title: 德意志银行的 Saravelos 认为 "巨大关税墙 "带来外汇风险
item.description:
称特朗普上台后全面征收关税将使美元和欧元达到平价

。【原文：

Says sweeping tariffs from a Trump presidency would send dollar and euro to parity

】

item.title: 桥水联合首席信息官认为人工智能为投资者增添了 "难以置信的力量
item.description: 对冲基金巨头桥水联合公司（Bridgewater Associates）联席首席投资官格雷格-詹森（Greg Jensen）表示，未来五年，机器学习可以改进 "人类投资者和分析师所能做的很多事情"。【原文：Over the next five years, machine learning can improve “so much of what human investors and analysts can do,” said Greg Jensen, co-chief investment officer of giant hedge fund firm Bridgewater Associates.】

item.title: 工党获胜后，NatWest 零售股票发行前景堪忧
item.description: 随着英国政权的更迭，拟对政府持有的英国国民西敏寺集团股份有限公司（NatWest Group Plc）股票进行零售发售的可能性正在减小。【原文：A proposed retail offering of government-held shares in NatWest Group Plc is looking less likely following the change of power in Britain.】

item.title: 英伟达以 400% 的涨幅取代特斯拉成为单只股票 ETF 之王
item.description: 在 ETF 投资的投机领域，有一只新股票一枝独秀。【原文：There’s a new stock reigning supreme in a speculative part of the ETF investment landscape.】

item.title: 印度考虑放宽大米出口限制，为世界买家带来福音
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，世界头号大米发货国印度可能会放宽对某些品种大米的出口限制，以避免该国在新作物于 10 月份上市之前出现供应过剩。【原文：India, the world’s top rice shipper, may relax restrictions on exports of some varieties to avoid a glut in the country before the new crop arrives in the market in October, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 卡莱尔全球资本市场主管 Lindley 由 Savino 接替
item.description: 据知情人士透露，凯雷集团（Carlyle Group Inc.【原文：Carlyle Group Inc.’s head of global capital markets, Brian Lindley, has left after more than 13 years at the alternative-asset manager, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 印度驳斥花旗集团就业报告称数据存在漏洞
item.description: 印度政府拒绝了花旗集团的一份报告，该报告称，即使经济年增长率达到 7%，印度也很难创造足够的就业机会。【原文：The Indian government rejected a Citigroup report claiming that the country will struggle to create enough jobs even if the economy grows at 7% annually.】

item.title: 尽管受到制裁，俄罗斯的石油交付量仍在不断降低
item.description: 旨在剥夺克里姆林宫石油美元的七国集团制裁未能实现其主要目标之一：推高俄罗斯石油的运输成本。【原文：Group of Seven sanctions aimed at depriving the Kremlin of petrodollars are failing in one of their key objectives: driving up the cost of delivering Russian oil.】

item.title: 埃克森炼油利润下降，第二季度盈利受挫
item.description: 埃克森美孚公司（Exxon Mobil Corp. ）预计，由于整个行业的利润率降低，炼油利润将下降，因此下调了第二季度的盈利预期。【原文：Exxon Mobil Corp. expects refining profits to drop due to lower margins across the industry, reducing earnings estimates for the second quarter.】

item.title: 人工智能需求激增，Brookfield 的 Data4 公司欲融资 20 亿美元
item.description: 据一位熟悉内情的人士透露，由布鲁克菲尔德（Brookfield）支持的法国数据中心集团 Data4 正在探索一项价值 20 亿美元的债务交易。【原文：Brookfield-backed French data center group Data4 is exploring a $2 billion debt deal, according to a person familiar with the matter.】

item.title: XMS 在伦敦聘用 Carlos Pinto 负责金融科技和 FIG 银行业务
item.description: 根据彭博社查阅的一份备忘录，XMS Capital Partners 已聘请投资银行家 Carlos Pinto 帮助其在英国建立金融技术和金融服务业务。【原文：XMS Capital Partners has hired investment banker Carlos Pinto to help build out its financial technology and financial services business in the UK, according to a memo reviewed by Bloomberg.】

item.title: Cboe 前首席执行官 Ed Tilly 加入 Clear Street 金融科技公司
item.description: Ed Tilly 将加入新成立的经纪服务提供商 Clear Street，这位前 Cboe Global Markets Inc.【原文：Ed Tilly is joining upstart brokerage-services provider Clear Street, as the former head of Cboe Global Markets Inc. takes a new leadership role in the securities industry.】

item.title: 所罗门合伙人公司聘用贝尔德二人组推动分销交易
item.description: 由 Natixis 支持的精品投资银行 Solomon Partners 已从 Robert W. Baird & Co.聘请了一对投资银行家，并计划在佛罗里达州坦帕市开设办事处。【原文：Solomon Partners, the boutique investment bank backed by Natixis, has hired a pair of investment bankers from Robert W. Baird & Co. and plans to open an office in Tampa, Florida.】

item.title: 联合国报告显示数千名卢旺达军人在刚果作战
item.description: 联合国专家说，数以千计的卢旺达军队正在支持刚果民主共和国东部的叛乱，这场叛乱已导致数百万人流离失所，并使两国处于战争边缘。【原文：Thousands of Rwandan troops are backing a rebellion in eastern Democratic Republic of Congo that has displaced millions of people and brought the two countries to the brink of war, United Nations experts said.】

item.title: 英国和法国大选后走上不同的能源之路
item.description:
英国首相基尔-斯塔默（Keir Starmer）受命推动可再生能源发展，而法国总统埃马纽埃尔-马克龙（Emmanuel Macron）则面临着一个四分五裂的联盟。【原文：

British Prime Minister Keir Starmer has a mandate to boost renewables while French President Emmanuel Macron faces a fractured coalition. 

】

item.title: 弗雷泽的离职修复者称花旗 "正走在重建之路上
item.description: 蒂蒂-科尔（Titi Cole）还有几个月就要从花旗集团退休了，简-弗雷泽（Jane Fraser）把她叫到花旗集团曼哈顿总部 38 层的一个私人座位上。【原文：Titi Cole was just months away from her long-planned retirement from Citigroup Inc. when Jane Fraser summoned her to a private seating area on the 38th floor of the firm’s Manhattan headquarters.】

item.title: 欧洲投资银行向西班牙最大的风险投资基金认捐 3.5 亿欧元
item.description: 欧洲投资银行（European Investment Bank）的风险投资部门已承诺向西班牙最大的风险投资基金提供 3.5 亿欧元（约合 3.79 亿美元）的资金；这是欧洲帮助本地公司克服投资低迷并阻止它们迁往海外的努力的一部分。【原文：The European Investment Bank’s venture capital arm has committed €350 million ($379 million) into what’s set to become Spain’s biggest venture capital fund — part of a European drive to help local companies overcome an investment slump and to stop them from relocating overseas.】

item.title: 特里谢称法国大选结果显示国家分裂
item.description:
欧洲央行前行长参加法国大选结果特别版Voternomics 。【原文：

The former ECB president joins a special edition of Voternomics on the French election results. 

】
